amendment.description: Amendment replaces the term "local" with "political subdivision", which allows the inclusion of "utility districts" that would not otherwise be covered but that were intended to be covered in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-41 to replace the term "local" with "political subdivision", which allows the inclusion of utility "districts" that would not otherwise be covered but that are intended to be covered in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 3 (Roll no. 112).
